remark.en: Restricted to undergrad students who failed English proficiency exams. Students must show up for the first class.

outline.ch:
以下授課內容為暫定，實際授課內容可能依狀況略有調整。
第１堂: 進修英文簡介
第2堂 ~ 第17堂: 面授課程及線上文法閱讀練習/期中考試
第18堂: 期末考
混合式課程：20小時面授教學和16小時線上學習：
提供線上課程讓學生自主學習；
針對學生個別學習問題，面對面個別指導。
outline.en:
Week 1: Course Introduction
Week2 ~ Week17: Regular classes ＆ Online Learning/quizzes + Mid-term Exam
Week18: Final Exam
This is an English class using blended learning/teaching methods. The course provides students a time-flexible online learning environment, where students learn from online materials by themselves asynchronously whenever available. In addition, instructors will provide 18-hour classroom lessons, plus individual tutoring sessions to students who need one-on-one assistance in reading and writing skills.

textbook.ch:
自編講義

textbook.en:
Self-compiled Learning Materials
Course Platform: NCU New ee Class System

gradMethod.ch:
以下評量配分比重內容為暫定，實際配分可能依狀況略有調整。
1. 課程參與(含實體上課出席，課堂練習，課後作業) 24％
2. 期中考 20％
3. New ee Class 閱讀測驗 36％
4. 期末考20 ％
gradMethod.en:
Tentative Grading Policy:
1.Homework, assignment ＆ participation 24％
2.Midterm 20％
2.Weekly Reading comprehension quizzes 36％
3.Final exam 20％
